oai_dc:dc.dc:title: D. D. Brisendine's certificate as alternate delegate for United Confederate Veteran (UCV) convention
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brisendine, who served as a sergeant in Co. I, 10th (DeMoss') Cav. Regt. and corporal in Co. T, 154th (Senior) Tenn. Inf. Regt., is certified as an alternate for UCV Fitzgerald Camp 1284 at the 1905 Reunion and Convention held at Louisville, Ky.
